site_title: Clean Wings - Professional Aircraft Cabin Cleaning in Tashkent
site_description: Professional aircraft cabin cleaning services in Tashkent. Aviation standards compliance, fast 24/7 service. Serving airlines and private jets.

hero.title: World-Class Professional Aircraft Cabin Cleaning
hero.subtitle: Clean Wings provides high-quality aircraft cabin cleaning services in Tashkent, meeting international aviation standards

about.title: About Clean Wings
about.subtitle: A fresh approach to professional aviation cleaning
about.text1: Clean Wings is a new specialized company for professional aircraft cabin cleaning in Tashkent. We apply modern cleaning methods and use professional equipment to ensure the highest standards of cleanliness.
about.text2: Our specialization is high-quality and fast cleaning of passenger cabins, cockpits, and aircraft service areas in compliance with all international aviation industry requirements.

services.subtitle: Complete range of cleaning services for aircraft

deep_cleaning.title: Deep Cabin Cleaning

sanitization.description: Using aviation cleanliness standards and passenger safety protocols

cockpit_cleaning.title: Cockpit Cleaning
cockpit_cleaning.description: Delicate treatment of instrument panels and sensitive equipment

lavatory_galley.title: Lavatory & Galley Cleaning
lavatory_galley.description: Special cleaning of service areas with enhanced hygiene requirements

cargo_cleaning.title: Cargo Hold Cleaning
cargo_cleaning.description: Professional cleaning of cargo and baggage compartments when needed

express_service.title: Express Service
express_service.description: Quick cleaning between flights to minimize aircraft downtime
